name: Cube Sil v0.1
description:
Cube Sil v0.1 is an experiment in fractal coding and exploration. There was no goal when I went into coding this except that I would most likely be using it as a prototype for another program. While not really a game, you can explore a bit and there is a hidden secret that allows you to... in a way... "win". Though not exceedingly obvious, the secret can be found in a matter of seconds and there is no real replay value here.

If you find the secret, private message me with the ending message displayed on your screen.

Controls: Left Mouse Button

Programmer: Onette du Joyeux (@merryonette)

Publisher: Sounds Merry Software (@soundsmerry)

Successfully tested on Windows 10. Please leave a comment below for any successful runs on other versions of Windows or reports of any bugs.
